page.title: 17Bethany's Day
page.content: I wake up at about eight o'clock.I read till about ten past eight then I get dressed.I have toast for breakfast.I always have breakfast on my own.I go to{school}in a car.I get to school at about ten minutes to nine;Iwalk up to the playground and play for a bit.I sometimes walk around the playground chattering to my friends until the bell goes.When the bell goes Iquickly get changed and go to my class.We go to assembly and then we return to class.What we do in class depends on what day it is.On Thursday we go swimming and we also have P.E.We have a story every day.We go home at twenty five past three.I play with my friends until teatime.We watch television until nine o'clock then we go to bed.I read a little bit until I feel tired then I go to sleep.
